values.content:
=You are helpful, intelligent resume writing assistant that drafts high converting resumes based on jobs.

This resume will be added to a Google Doc, so write it in HTML format that I can easily copy/paste. Do not output any backticks (no ```). Your first
characters should be <html>

=#Overview
I'm looking for jobs. Your task is to customise a provided resume using a provided job description.

Here is the job description:
{{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.description }}

Here is my resume:

# Lukas Schneider

**Electrical Engineer**

üìç Munich, Germany | üìû +49 151 23456789 | ‚úâÔ∏è [lukas.schneider@email.com](mailto:lukas.schneider@email.com) | üîó linkedin.com/in/lukas-schneider-ee | üîó github.com/lukas-schneider-ee

---

## Professional Summary

Results-driven Electrical Engineer with **6+ years of experience** in designing, developing, testing, and maintaining electrical systems for industrial and commercial applications across the EU. Strong background in **power systems, industrial automation, and control engineering**, with proven ability to deliver projects on time and in compliance with **IEC, IEEE, and EU safety standards**. Adept at cross-functional collaboration, troubleshooting complex systems, and continuous improvement.

---

## Core Skills

* Electrical System Design & Analysis
* Power Systems & Power Electronics
* Industrial Automation & Control Systems
* PLC & SCADA Systems
* Circuit Design (Analog & Digital)
* Electrical Testing & Commissioning
* Fault Analysis & Troubleshooting
* AutoCAD Electrical & EPLAN P8
* MATLAB / Simulink / Python
* Compliance with IEC, IEEE, NEC, CE Standards
* Project Coordination & Technical Documentation

---

## Professional Experience

### Electrical Engineer ‚Äì Siemens AG

**Munich, Germany | March 2019 ‚Äì Present**

* Designed and implemented electrical systems for **industrial automation and manufacturing facilities**, improving system efficiency by **18%**.
* Developed single-line diagrams, wiring schematics, and panel layouts using **EPLAN P8 and AutoCAD Electrical**.
* Performed load calculations, short-circuit analysis, and protection coordination using **ETAP**.
* Collaborated with mechanical, software, and safety teams to ensure full CE compliance.
* Conducted factory acceptance tests (FAT), site acceptance tests (SAT), and commissioning activities across Germany and Austria.

### Junior Electrical Engineer ‚Äì Schneider Electric

**Berlin, Germany | July 2017 ‚Äì February 2019**

* Assisted in the design and simulation of low-voltage power distribution and control systems.
* Supported **PLC programming (Siemens S7)**, panel wiring, and on-site installation activities.
* Conducted preventive maintenance and fault analysis, reducing unplanned downtime by **22%**.
* Prepared technical reports, risk assessments, and maintenance documentation in accordance with IEC standards.

---

## Key Projects

### Automated Production Line ‚Äì Automotive Industry

* Designed a complete **power distribution and control system** for an automated production line.
* Implemented PLC and SCADA integration using **Siemens TIA Portal**.
* Achieved a **15% reduction in energy consumption** while meeting all EU safety regulations.

### Renewable Energy Substation Upgrade

* Upgraded protection and control systems for a **20 MW solar power substation**.
* Performed relay coordination and system testing in compliance with **IEC 61850**.
* Improved system reliability and reduced fault response time by **30%**.

---

## Education

**Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering**
Technical University of Munich (TUM), Munich, Germany
2017

---

## Certifications

* T√úV Certified Electrical Engineer (Germany)
* Siemens PLC Programming (TIA Portal)
* AutoCAD Electrical Professional Certification
* EU Electrical Safety & CE Marking Certification

---

## Technical Tools

* **Software:** AutoCAD Electrical, EPLAN P8, MATLAB, Simulink, ETAP, PSpice, LabVIEW
* **Hardware:** PLCs (Siemens S7), VFDs, Protection Relays, Sensors, HMIs

---

## Soft Skills

* Analytical Problem Solving
* Technical Communication & Documentation
* Cross-Functional Team Collaboration
* Time Management & Project Coordination

---

## Additional Information

* Willing to travel within the EU: Yes
* Languages: German (Native), English (Fluent), French (Basic)
* Work Authorization: EU Citizen

---

**References available upon request**

nodes.name: Create a Custom Resume for a specific job

values.content: =You're an intelligent bot perfect at creating cover letters for a job. Please take the candidates resume and create a customized cover letter to the job.

=Here's the job listing details:
JobTitle: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.job_title }}
Company name: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.company }}
Description: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.description }}
Location: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.location }}
Salary: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.salary }}
Job type: {{ $('Get dataset items1').item.json.work_type }}

Here is the candidate skill set:
SAMPLE RESUME

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet1
Append or update row in sheet2

values.content:
=You're an intelligent bot rating how closely a job listing matches a candidate's preferences, on a score of 10.
Please add up all the points and create a total out of 10.

a) 4 points if the job is an amazing fit for electronics or electrical engineering (skills, projects, tools match very well), 2 points if it mostly matches (partially related to electronics/EE).

b) 3 points if the job is located in one of the preferred countries: Finland, Bulgaria, Sweden, Norway, Latvia, Switzerland, Germany, Netherlands

c) 1 point if the job is an on-site position (you prefer on-site over remote).

d) 1 point if the company offers benefits (any benefits).

e) 1 point if it's full-time (not contract or part-time).

Example:

If the job mostly fits, is located in Sweden, is on-site, has no benefits, and is not full-time, the total points would be: 6

If the job fits perfectly, is located in Germany, is not on-site (remote), has a few benefits, and isn't full-time, the total points would be: 8

=Here's the job listing details:
Location: {{ $json.location }}
Salary: {{ $json.salary }}
JobTitle: {{ $json.job_title }}
Benefits: {{ $json.benefits }}
Job type/term: {{ $json.work_type }} (i.e. part time, full time,
contract etc)
{{ $json.description }}

Here is the candidate skill set:
SAMPLE RESUME

# Lukas Schneider

**Electrical Engineer**

üìç Munich, Germany | üìû +49 151 23456789 | ‚úâÔ∏è [lukas.schneider@email.com](mailto:lukas.schneider@email.com) | üîó linkedin.com/in/lukas-schneider-ee | üîó github.com/lukas-schneider-ee
